name: Shane Hardman
text: do not recommend Industrial Cleaning Products, 629 Banks St, Glencoe, AL 35905 for repairs. I dropped off my lawn mower and was told it would be a week, maybe less to fix. A week and a day later I call and they have not even looked at the mower because the misplaced my paperwork. So two weeks and a day later I have to call again. The lady that answers the phone says that David will have to call me back. Finally receive a call back from the same lady to tell me that the mower is ready. You would think that they would at least knock some off the price after jerking me around...but nope. I will never do business with them again. Anybody know a GOOD small engine repair shop?

name: Danny Hancock
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful, knows his business .

name: Daniel Porter
text: Nice place, good people

name: Dazzling Mystic
text: They came out and tried their best to fix the problem we had. They even tried to find our main drain clean out. Their tools was just to big to go the only way they knew how to do it without the main drain clean out. They where polite and did not take a dime even when I offered to pay something for their time they spent and for trying. Very good company and will be hiring them to have a main drain clean out put in later and for my plumbing issues after.

name: brandon green
text: July12,2019,I had an invoice from Glenn Jennings for $480.00.  They fired Glen Jennings after I agreed to the quote. I agreed to it. I didn't hear from the company at all.They sent another plumber and he stated he didn't know anything about the previous quote and stated he couldn't honor it. The date was around August 21. After waiting a week to get a response about the quote, I called the Roto-Rooter back and asked to speak to the manager. The manager whom never returned my called. I think this was bad busy. I called another company  called Machen Plumbing who took very good care of me. And they gave me a cheaper quote 0f $295.00. They showed me the parts prices and the problem to all of my concerns. Here are all the pictures to prove. Please trust me, Do Not Go Though Roto Rooter At All!!!!!!!!!!!!You will be very disappointment.

resp.text: Hi Brandon, thanks for the feedback.. I am sorry for dropping the ball on your job. We have corrected both the manpower and process so we can do a better job next time. Randy

name: Linda Sufficool
text: I have had the pleasure of meeting TJ Woods twice, even though I never wanted to see him again haha (who likes plumbing issues?). Both times he was punctual, kind, and he listened to what I had to say. Although he was not able to fix my issue (city main sewer line) he was extremely helpful. He is the nicest repair man and I never want to need him again, but if I do, I know exactly who I will trust!

name: Melanie Gurley
text: Justin was knowledgable and professional.   Very pleasant. Played

name: Tommie Goggans
text: TJ was awesome! He did a very good job. He went above and beyond! Thank you!

name: larry wise
text: Very prompt good service and explained price before service so there was no hidden fees

name: Jeff Gaither
text: Technician was friendly and worked steady until the job was done.

name: Judy Kretzschmar
text: The gentleman was very efficent and completed the work quickly  after letting me know what the problem was and where.  I will definately use Roto-Rooter again should I need plumbing work done in the future.

name: Tom Brown
text: Pete did an outstanding job. On time, professional,  extremely fair price, and fixed the problem . Its rare in today's society. To find someone of this caliber. You made a life long customer. Thank you

name: Rick Moreland
text: Great job clearing drain pipe to septic TJ was very professional

name: eric49401
text: Thank You. Pete did a great job on my septic pump.

name: Aleathia Sales
text: The Tech was very prompt. Was expect him later be he arrived 30 mins after I call for service. He waa very nice and did the procedure twice to make sure everything was fixed. Great Job.

name: Tara Howard
text: We got an estimate on a mainwater pipe etc. The man was very helpful and knowledgeable. Only issue we had was communication with  the appointment, but we did get it worked out.

name: Rolf Johnson
text: Repairman arrived on time and was very polite and did an excellent job.  No problems since his visit.  5 Stars to him.

name: Vicki Langley
text: Travis was my technician and he was fantastic!  I highly recommend!

name: Jamie Girot
text: Elijah was very friendly and made sure everything was working properly before he left.  He explained everything and gave us a senior citizen discount, which was very much appreciated.  I will definitely recommend Roto Rooter and Elijah and they will be my first call if we have any problems in the future.  Thank you!!

name: Linh Hayes
text: Elijah was very professional and knowledgeable. Everything was as quoted and even with some hardships, he fixed the problems right away for us!

name: Danny Murphree
text: Chris came out and unstopped a line and was very respectful. I would recommend this group to any of my family and or friends.

name: valjeanne jeffers
text: They are very professional and competent. Jeff arrived at my house within 30 minutes, and resolved my plumbing issue within less than an hour. The price was also very reasonable. This company has great service and prices!

name: Pamela Gunter
text: Great friendly and quick repairs

name: Joanne White
text: Excellent fast service. I called them out on memorial day and they showed up fast and was very professional.  I would highly recommend this service.

name: Chris Daugherty
text: Keith was awesome.

name: Kim Heath
text: Justin was knowledgeable, kind, and fast.

name: katina higgins
text: They got the job done and was so nice.

name: Hilton Wiggins
text: I hadn’t been able to do laundry for several weeks. They came out and diagnosed the problem, fixed it in no time at all and had me back up and running very quickly. For a reasonable price as well. Thank you

name: Tony Cavitt
text:
The tech did a good job, in a reasonable amount of time. He was courteous and professional.
I do think $153 is rather steep for 30 min to snake/clear a grease clog.
I was put off one day from the original scheduling, which happens.
the only negative parts are: (1) when the tech called to reschedule the first appointment, i requested that he call me when he was on his way so that i could lock my watchdogs in the back BEFORE he got there. I also requested the same of the lady who called afterward to verify the appt change. Neither called before he arrived, dogs went ballistic when he turned in the drive and it was MUCH harder to get them kenneled. Very aggravating after asking both people!
(2) The tech came to my door with NO mask on expecting entry and I had to send him to his truck for a mask. We are elderly and my wife has COPD. That is irresponsible and surprising in the middle of this pandemic. It should be a mandatory requirement for Roto-Rooter...

name: Sandra Persons
text: The tech was great!  Kept updating me on what was going on.  Was honest with me about what was causing the problem.  Got everything going again.  Highly recommend them.  Great service.

name: CEM CEM
text: Justin was marvelous in his performance draining my stopped up tub and installing a new trim lever. He was prompt, hard working, extremely knowledgeable of the task before him. He also did an excellent job informing step by step what he was going to do in the repair process!!

name: Lori Crabtree
text: He was extremely nice, helpful, and informing.  He was letting me know everything he was trying.  I appreciated that!

name: katina hawkins
text: So far I have only had a estimate.  The tech was friendly and  observant . I am waiting to see how the actual  service go. My appointment is soon.

name: Tina Williams
text: The plumber was very respectful and explained everything to me. I will definitely be recommending you all.

name: Sandra F
text: They came out as promised. In a timely frame. Very professional and polite. Took precaution.

name: Brooke Brewer
text: Chris was amazing! He was very thorough with the job and explained everything in great detail. He made sure we knew what was good and bad for our drainage system, and solved our issue quickly.

name: Dewayne Klebine
text: Might be a little pricey but definitely worth the money. They were very responsive. Got here quickly. Make sure everything was working well before they left. Thanks for the service!

name: Ramona Thompson
text: Elijah went far and beyond to fix my problem.  He was knowledgeable, on time and very professional..I was extremely pleased with Roto-Rooter and will be using them again as needed in the future...Thank You, Roto-Rooter.

name: McKenna Sheppard
text: Called them and was put on hold for an extended period of time.  The receptionist was very rude and acted like they didn’t even want my business.  Never again!

resp.text: Ms. Sheppard, thanks for letting me know about your experience. I did review your call and we did leave you on hold for an extended period of time for which I am sorry. I am working with our team to correct this problem. Again, if you have a plumbing need I hope you will give us another chance to earn your trust. Randy Anderson Owner.

name: Albernetta Johnson
text: He came here spotted the problem in less than 10 minutes. We’ve had multiple companies come out plan to dig our yard up and still couldn’t tell us the problem. He was very knowledgeable of the job he was doing.

name: mark cassity
text: Professional and on time.  I will use again if needed.  T.J. you da man!

name: sharonda mallory
text: TJ Woods was very informative and professional. My service was on time and my expectations were exceeded.

name: Sue Stalnaker
text: Awesome and honest people to do business with, at a very reasonable price

name: Ronald Burton
text: The worker TJ was awesome and helping up

name: Kelly G
text: They were very personable, polite and professional. He answered all the questions that I asked and was very knowledgeable. He made sure he answered all I asked. He fixed all my problems. I will definitely use again. I recommend them to everyone.

name: Misty
text: Easy scheduling on-line. Arrived when scheduled. Professional. I will use again.

name: Jaclyn Robinson
text: Plumber was very professional in interactions.  He came out before to provide an estimate with no pressure.  He showed up when he said he would and pretty much did what he said he would.  He kept me informed of any changes or new developments and provided me with multiple options to pursue.  I definitely left with a positive image of Roto-Rooter and will look to use them again in the future.

name: Arleen Krizka
text: He was on time, quoted me a price and did the work the same day. Very pleased and would not hesitate to use them again.

name: Kameron Mizzell
text: When I called I had someone here within 45 minutes. Very informative, very professional, and most importantly they care about their customers.

name: David Fuller
text: Extremely professional, friendly & competent technician. Michael did a great job & I would be happy to call on him again should my family have a plumbing need. Thank you.

name: Mike Pollard
text: Home owner was very pleased with the results and of the young man who performed the service,

name: Randy Stevens
text: TJ worked the drain problem until it was fixed. I am very pleased with the results.

name: LaDawn P - SANE
text: We had a Thanksgiving day football accident that resulted in a busted water line. Roto Rooter was awesome and got us all fixed. :)

name: Elvin Perez
text: Extremely professional and knowledgeable

name: Odessa Macon
text: I’ve dealt with this company before several years ago but it was a different owner and I decided to call a again. The receptionist was nice took my information and told me the time and who would be coming to fix the problem. The service personnel contact me and arrived on time to go over what was needed to be done and the cost of repair. Every thing went well and I was pleased with the service.

name: DEMARION Whiteside
text: Roto Rooter was very professional and quick. The job was done very quickly .Thank you! I would recommend anyone to you guys.

name: Steve Daingerfield
text: Don’t know what they are doing with water damage.

resp.text: Hi Steve, I am sorry you had a bad experience but I don’t have any record of our company doing any work for you. Could you have us confused with someone else?

name: TheUS ofLeland
text: Hunter Stephens came by. Very knowledgeable and very professional and when it came time for payment, I still got to keep both my arms and legs!! Roto Rooter cost me approximately $50 less than the lowest quote I had received, regarding this job! Thanks!! If I need plumbing services again, I know who to call!

name: Syd
text: Great Experience. Was here in no time to fix issue.

name: Roxannie Hutto
text: They sent 2 great men who didn’t give up to figure out what’s problem. I definitely will give a call again if there’s problem. Friendly and willing to discuss about the situation clearly. Many thanks!!

name: Faye McMillian
text: The Young Man Was Very Professional And Polite, He Solved My Problem With Ease. Thank You! Roto Rooter!!

name: Mike Yeager
text: Hunter contacted me and showed up at the agreed time. Asked a few questions and gave me a estimate which I ok'd and he got right to work. Was very professional and polite. Job well done in record time. I definitely recommend these services.

name: Melissa Wilson
text: Very fast response and easy to work with.

name: Jeff Bost
text: The service man that met me at the house was 10 min late which is no big deal.  He was friendly and was 6-7 out of 10 for his knowledge of well systems.  I chose to use home advisor to contact professionalplumbers for me because it was advertised that I was to receive a free estimate for any repairs and/or services.  I then was informed at the end of his time at the residence that I would be responsible for a $122 service call fee.  Honestly it feels like a scam.  I would have never given permission for roto rooter to come here knowing this.  He was here for about an hour and 10 min. and I helped by running back and forth opening valves and turning off power to the pump.  Information is the key to good reviews and making money off of honest people...otherwise businesses are cheats and dishonest.  You have to decide as a business which you desire to be.  You will only be able to fool people who don't know any better.  It's a sad day for consumers when businesses drop to this type of low.

resp.text: Hi Mr Bost, thanks for your feedback.. I reviewed this with our Plumber and while he did perform the service he charged you for, he did not get your written approval to do the work. As such, I have removed the bill from your account. We are in the service business, our folks are trained to solve your problem.. As you said we invested over an hour of our time doing the job for you. All the best. Randy Anderson President.

name: Vernon Marable
text: The guys were very nice and professional.  They diagnosed the problem and explained it to me where I could understand what was going on. I highly recommend Roto-Rooter Plumbers.

name: Brittany Hendrix
text: JP truly did an amazing job fixing the two leaks my home had in the kitchen and bathroom. He had the job finished the same day he came out to do my inspection. Within just a few hours, he was finished and the work he did looks amazing!! Could not be more happy with the end results!

name: Alan Miller
text: Glenn was more than professional. He did everything possible to fix my plumbing problems. I am very satisfied. I recommend Roto-Rooter for your plumbing problems.

name: Emily Conover
text: T. J. was professional and thorough  - friendly and polite.

name: daniel Shelton
text: Very good service and attitude. Even on Christmas day Glenn Jennings went above and beyond. Definitely recommend and will use in the future.

name: Shila Abney
text: Didn't show till hours later and lady on the phone was rude

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback.. I reviewed the dialog and found that we were late in servicing your needs. I have taken steps to improve our level of service. Please accept my apology. Randy Anderson

name: Robin Woolsey
text: Appreciate the speedy and professional service.  Glenn is always so helpful and candid about what needs to be done to solve my plumbing issues in the most economical but thorough way.

name: Stacey Spears
text: Even though we had a few issues with our "special" hot water heater, Tim was very professional and knowledgeable in the replacement.

name: Eunice C
text: A picture text was sent to me before the Tech arrived. Technician was on time. He was professional both in appearance and in the way he communicated with me.

name: Renee Blair
text: Technicians were knowledgeable and friendly. They thoroughly explained the problem and were able to repair this issue quickly.

name: Angela Glass
text: The technician alerted me when he was on his way. He was very professional and worked hard to get the job done. He cleaned up afterwards as well.

name: Ellen Peck
text: The plumber that came out was great- very knowledgeable and efficient, explained everything clearly. My only complaint is that I called early in the morning and he couldn’t get here until after 4pm.

name: Matthew Weathington
text: Glenn Jennings was my technician (plumber). Before he arrived I received a text notifying me that he was on his way, and a picture of him so that I knew whom to expect. His appearance and attitude were extremely professional. Glenn is an excellent communicator who kept my expectations as a customer, right where they needed to be. An honest man with a work ethic like Glenn’s is not only a rare treasure, it was inspirational. He always answered his phone if I had a question. It was a pleasure to listen to his knowledge and expertise. I really can’t say enough good things about this man and the company for whom he works. I would recommend Roto-Rooter and/or Glenn Jennings to anyone with any plumbing/water/etc. issues. He is certainly an irreplaceable asset to any of Roto-Rooter’s potential customers. I will definitely call Roto-Rooter/Glenn Jennings first with any plumbing needs I have in the future. Needless to say, they both come HIGHLY recommended.

name: April Kennedy
text: The tec was real professional. Did the job in a timely manner. I will have Roto-rooter do all my plumbing needs

name: Gary Shelton
text: Everything went very well, if the  sink stays unclogged I consider that well spent money. And with the guarantee in sure that I will stay very satisfied.

name: Andy Nevala
text:
Cameron spent three days working on our pipes in a difficult situation - saw it through to the end.  I will always call these guys first. The bill came in way less than I was anticipating for all the work they did. I used a local guy at first and He charged almost as much just to spray water in my clean out. Rotorooter came in, identified the problem, and corrected it.

Always go with the Nationaly licensed and insured company. Worth every penny.

name: Katrene Chatman
text: The technician was timely,  friendly,  and professional.  He repaired my problem and was very knowledgeable about his work.

name: Daniel Prater
text: TJ was very professional and nice, he does great work!

name: Linda Smith
text: Believe all the bad reviews,  I will be writing a second review after review our cameras. 2 visits, 1st friendly techs, 2nd visit head tech absolutely unprofessional to the point his helper had to apologize, worst in class in all areas. I wish I took the time to read the reviews. #Criminals #Crooks #Thieves #Liars #LowClass #LackingSkill #Unprofessional #DoomedToRepeat #DefinitionOfInsanity

resp.text:
Hello Linda Smith, first I am sorry you had a bad experience. I would love to resolve it but I am unable to find you in our services database. We send out Google review requests to all our customers after service but your review did not come through that process. If you would please respond with your service address or call our office then I can work to resolve your issues. Thanks Randy

Part 2, No response from Linda Smith, no record of doing work for you.. we did discharge a plumber with the last name of Smith for dishonesty with a customer, so we can assume that you are related and your complaint is the result of his discharge.

name: Patrick McGinnis
text: Service was great technition was on time professional and polite would recommend them to anyone who needs a plumber

name: explorethejourney
text: Great job! Proficient and on time. Definitely use them again!

name: Derric Lewis
text: Glenn was very informative about the service being performed before serving the appliance

name: Pielikeme
text: Made an appointment they told me they would come between 1pm-5pm and never called or showed up. I called the office and they called me a liar and totally disrespected a loyal customer. Corporate should revoke their franchise.

name: Tina Diamond
text: Good efficient service an solved the problem.  Price wasn't over the top.

name: Angie Strickland
text: Once the plumber was able to get here, service was awesome! Get him here was sad!

name: William Thompson
text: Very polite and professional pleased doing business with you thank you

name: MichaelS Green
text: Very respectful will use them again

name: Ardelan Shabani
text: Quick fix great job also 30 day warranty.  A ++

name: Ron
text: Have mold after they tried cleaning up water.

resp.text: Hi Ron, I am sorry you are having a problem but we don't have a record of working for a "Ron" in the last weeks. Please contact our office at your earliest so we can resolve your issue. Randy

name: David Turley
text: Friendly

name: Verna Seals
text: Excellent service

name: Kingsley Harbor
text: Excellent

name: Macius Darkwood
text: Thank you for the timely work.

name: Terri Smith
text:
Prices are to high..
Would not recommend or refer anyone.

name: christi mullins
text: Great people!

name: Randall Chance
text: Great fast service.
